title: What happened to my summoner???
body: So i wanted to play league today so i tried logging in to my summoner with the same exact information as the day before and Im put to a screen that is telling me to make a summoner name. I was very, very confused so i decided to change my password and username several times and i was greeted with the same screen every. single. time. So i decided to go ahead and make the new summoner name and then I see my level 30 summoner with several champions has been replaced by a level 1 summoner with nothing. I went to search for my old summoner and i could see that it was still there but I just couldnt sign into it. Why did this literally happen over night and why cant I sign in? Can I please get some help Riot? Ive submitted a ticket and Im getting no help because its a bot. Can I please talk to an actual person? I put alot of my time and money into the game only for my summoner to be taken away for no reason.

replies.body:
Since you've submitted a ticket already, I recommend sitting tight until one of our account specialists gets back to you about this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
